description: Ataru can run, but he can’t hide - not from Lum, and not from the gorgeous shrine maiden Sakura’s eagle eyes. She can tell at a glance that he’s in dire need of exorcism!

titles.title: Anata ni Ageru / Shiawase no Kiiroi Ribbon
Present for You / The Yellow Ribbon of Happiness
あなたにあげる / 幸せの黄色いリボン
